The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

Credits

Jekyll theme

  • This site uses Flâneur, a Jekyll theme using the Leaflet JavaScript library. It was developed by Dawn ChildressDawn Childress and ported to Jekyll by Dawn Childress & Dominique O’Neill. It is based on the original Boulevardier framework developed by Dawn Childress & Nathan Day. Flâneur is based on her earlier mapping and texts framework, Boulevardier.
